comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of color printers to be produced
- y: number of black and white printers to be produced

Definitions:
- x: number of color printers to be produced
- y: number of black and white printers to be produced

Constraints:
- Color Printer Production: x \leq 20
- Black and White Printer Production: y \leq 30
- Paper Tray Installing Machine Limitation: x + y \leq 35
- Non-negativity: x \geq 0, y \geq 0

Objective:
- Maximize profit: Maximize Z = 200x + 70y
